page.title: 03CLUBS
page.content: There is a{Youth Club}that meets on a Friday evening in the newly refurbished Reading Room. This is popular with the under 16's.{The W.I. meet as 2 separate groups,the Updale W.I. and the Abbey W.I. In the Milburn Arms Hotel,{Domino}teams play throughout the winter as do{Dart {Teams.}A{Football Club}plays in the Becket League.There has been no Cricket Club for the past two summer seasons. An{Art Club}meet on Wednesdays for practical,constructive and critical sessions. The{Pony Club {has 30 members drawn}from Farndale, Cropton and Rosedale. Most of the rallies are held in the Milburn Arms field. A{Farming Club}of about 50 meet on a regular basis for varied farming instruction.A{Ladies Keep-Fit Class}is held once a week in the winter months.
